fields.value: Replication data for: Patterns of long-term settlement in the Upper Khabur Basin, northeastern Syria.

authorAffiliation.value: Harvard University; Massachusetts Institute of Technology

dsDescriptionValue.value: This repository contains the results of a remote sensing based survey of the Upper Khabur Basin in  in northeastern Syria and adjacent regions. More specifically, it contains a 22000 sq km map at 10m resolution derived from multi-spectral ASTER imagery that is indicating the most likely locations of anthrosols and, hence, of ancient settlements. The repository also contains files with locations, outlines and physical measurements (volume and height in SRTM digital elevation model, area) for all 14000+ sites identified in the anthrosol probability map.

publicationCitation.value: Menze BH, Ur JA. Mapping patterns of long-term settlement in Northern Mesopotamia at a large scale. PNAS 2012.

producerAffiliation.value: Harvard University; Massachusetts Institute of Technology

files.description: The data set contains the anthrosol probability map as geo-referenced scalar map (geotiff) and as standard image file, together with projection information. Read "readme.txt" contained in the zip archive for more details.
files.label: menze-ur_khabur_anthrosol-map.zip

dataFile.description: The data set contains the anthrosol probability map as geo-referenced scalar map (geotiff) and as standard image file, together with projection information. Read "readme.txt" contained in the zip archive for more details.

files.description: Overview map with data from the "anthrosol-map" and the "outlines" files. The pdf file shows the anthrosol probability map at 15m resolution (dark pixels = high probability, white pixels = low probability). Indicated are also outlines of the sites evaluated in this study (brown lines) and a lat/lon grid (gray lines).
files.label: menze-ur_khabur_overview.pdf

dataFile.description: Overview map with data from the "anthrosol-map" and the "outlines" files. The pdf file shows the anthrosol probability map at 15m resolution (dark pixels = high probability, white pixels = low probability). Indicated are also outlines of the sites evaluated in this study (brown lines) and a lat/lon grid (gray lines).

files.description: The data set  provides the locations of all 14000+ recorded sites (in UTM coordinates), together with measured area, volume and elevation.
files.label: menze-ur_khabur_sites-data.csv

dataFile.description: The data set  provides the locations of all 14000+ recorded sites (in UTM coordinates), together with measured area, volume and elevation.

files.description: The data set provides the outlines of all sites evaluated in this study. It can be viewed with GIS software, or as overlay for satellite imagery in Google Earth (earth.google.com).
files.label: menze-ur_khabur_sites-outlines.kmz

dataFile.description: The data set provides the outlines of all sites evaluated in this study. It can be viewed with GIS software, or as overlay for satellite imagery in Google Earth (earth.google.com).
